description:
Joplin is a free, open source note taking and to-do application, which can handle a large number of notes organised into notebooks.

Joplin is a free, open source note taking and to-do application, which can handle a large number of notes organised into notebooks.
- Fixed: Improve the reliability of fetching resources (#10826) (#10740 by @pedr)
- Security: Fix HTML parsing bug (#10876) (reported by @febou92)
